arts.ttl: “We deserved more today” — Bayern Munich captain Manuel Neuer speaks out following the one-sided 1-1 draw against Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Bayern Munich and Bayer Leverkusen’s top-of-the-table Bundesliga clash ended in a 1-1 draw after a brilliant team performance by Bayern yielded just a single goal, leaving fans who left Bayern should have gone home with all three points frustrated. Speaking post-game, captain Manuel Neuer echoed the same sentiment; “I think we deserved more today.

arts.ttl: How serious was Harry Kane’s ankle injury in Bayern Munich’s match against Bayer Leverkusen?
arts.sum: After the match, Bayern head coach Vincent Kompany (captured via @iMiaSanMia ) gave an uncertain update regarding Kane’s potential injury, saying, “I’m not a doctor, but I hope [it’s] nothing serious. More positive news is that Kane appears to be walking without much trouble, and believes he’ll be available for the match midweek against Aston Villa in the Champions League .

arts.ttl: Vincent Kompany highlights the need to support Aleksandar Pavlović after mistake following the highs and lows of 1-1 draw against Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Speaking after the match, @iMiaSanMia captured Bayern head coach Vincent Kompany acknowledging Pavlović’s incredible talent but also highlighting the necessity of support when he makes a mistake: “[He is a] very talented young player. Though normally characterized by calm play and incredible maturity far beyond his years, something was a little bit off about Bayern Munich player Aleksandar Pavlović today during the Bundesliga match against Bayer Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: Dominic Solanke reveals private conversation with Harry Kane and insists Tottenham 'are not scared of anyone' ahead of their Premier League clash against Manchester United
arts.sum: Solanke appears to have found his footing in north London and will arrive at Old Trafford to face Manchester United on Sunday on the back of two goals in as many games.

arts.ttl: Written in the stars: Hansi Flick and FC Barcelona handed their first La Liga defeat by a Bayern Munich loanee
arts.sum: Bryan Zaragoza, on loan at Osasuna after being bought by Bayern last winter, had a excellent game against the Spanish league leaders, managing a goal and an assist in a 4-2 win. The win and three points bumps up Osasuna in the league table, while leaving Barca vulnerable to Madrid sneaking up behind them.

arts.ttl: Bayern boss Vincent Kompany hopeful Harry Kane will be fit for Aston Villa clash
arts.sum: The England striker limped off against Bayer Leverkusen after taking a knock to his left ankle.

arts.ttl: England suffer Harry Kane injury scare as Vincent Kompany provides update
arts.sum: Bayern Munich and England suffer an untimely scare over the fitness of Harry Kane, who is forced off injured against Bayer Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: Aleksandar Pavlovic stunner earns Bayern Munich draw against Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Inter Milan got back to winning ways in Italy, but Barcelona suffered a shock 4-2 loss against Osasuna.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich’s Aleksandar Pavlović talks after his stunning equalizer against Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Undoubtedly, the highlight of Bayern Munich ’s long-awaited clash with Leverkusen was Aleksandar Pavlović’s rocket of an equalizer from over thirty yards out, and the passionate celebration right after. Speaking about the game, Pavlović too expressed a touch of remorse for not getting as much from the game as the team wanted: “We had so many chances and didn’t reward ourselves.

arts.ttl: Dominic Solanke details private Harry Kane conversation in Tottenham dressing room
arts.sum: MANCHESTER UNITED vs TOTTENHAM: Dominic Solanke is looking to make it three goals in as many matches at Old Trafford despite claiming he will never be able to replace goal-scoring icon Harry Kane at Spurs
